title: Child's horizon
brief_description: Outlines the work of UNICEF in attempting to counter some of the causes of blindness in children: malnutrition, cataracts, infections and accidents. Also highlights factors that agravate the spread of disease - Poverty, ignorance, crowded living conditions, lack of clear water and poor sanitation.
